name: Shadowlings
description: Shadowlings - is a slaughter to heavy metal in decorations of Medieval Japan.Hardcore battles, in which everything depends on your skill, ancient ninja's martial arts, sharp swords, strong spears and mysterious Shadow Magic.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® Vista / 7 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 gb DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space
